overview: After having received inappropriate treatment in hospital and having suffered from the injuries caused by the episiotomy that was practised on her without her consent, the actress Iria Pinheiro starts a legal battle against the public Health System in Galicia. However, disappointed by how complex and expensive this process is, she decides to turn to theatre practice as a way to denounce what she went through. The rehearsals and the scenes from the play show how Pinheiro tells her story using parody as the driving force to make this hidden reality visible.
title: Anatomía dunha serea
